signals.title: NVIDIA Physical AI 선언 - Vera Rubin 플랫폼 발표
AI 하이프에서 실용주의로 전환
World Models 시대 본격화 - LeCun $5B 랩 설립
Agentic AI Revolution: From Generative to Applied
signals.description: 2026년 생성형 AI에서 응용형 에이전트 AI로의 전환 가속화. 에이전트 상호운용성, 자기검증, 메모리 기술의 돌파구로 AI가 고립된 도구에서 복잡한 다단계 워크플로우를 처리하는 통합 시스템으로 변모.

signals.title: Physical AI Integration: DeepMind-Boston Dynamics Collaboration
signals.description: AI가 스크린을 벗어나 기어, 칩, 일상의 구조물로 이동. Google DeepMind와 Boston Dynamics가 Gemini급 멀티모달 모델을 새로운 전기 Atlas 휴머노이드에 통합하는 2020년대 가장 중요한 로보틱스 협업 발표.

signals.title: NVIDIA Vera Rubin Platform Unveiled at CES 2026
signals.description: CES 2026에서 NVIDIA가 Blackwell 아키텍처를 잇는 최신 플래그십 AI 플랫폼 Vera Rubin 공개. 처리 능력과 메모리 대역폭의 획기적 개선.

signals.title: AI in Scientific Research: Actively Joining Discovery Process
signals.description: 2026년 AI가 단순 논문 요약이나 질문 응답을 넘어 물리학, 화학, 생물학의 발견 과정에 적극 참여. 가설 생성, 과학 실험 제어, 연구자와의 협업 수행.

signals.title: IBM Quantum Milestone: First Quantum Advantage in 2026
signals.description: IBM이 2026년 양자 컴퓨터가 최초로 고전 컴퓨터를 능가하는 양자 우위(Quantum Advantage) 달성을 공식 발표.

signals.title: Year of Quantum Security Initiative Launched
signals.description: 2026년 1월 12일 워싱턴 DC에서 양자 보안 이니셔티브 출범. 연방 기관, 산업 리더, 투자자가 모여 글로벌 양자 생태계 전반의 정책, 보안 관행, 조정 정렬. 2026년을 '양자 보안의 해'로 지정.

signals.title: AI-Powered Sleep Analysis Predicts Future Disease Risk
signals.description: Stanford 연구진이 단 하룻밤 수면 데이터로 미래 질병 위험을 예측하는 AI 개발. 뇌, 심장, 호흡의 상세한 생리학적 신호 분석.

signals.title: Global Energy Storage Surpasses 100GW Annual Installations
signals.description: 2026년 글로벌 연간 에너지 저장 설치량 사상 최초 100GW 돌파. 향후 10년 200GW 이상 예상. 장비 가격 $117/kWh로 3년 전의 3분의 1 수준으로 하락.

signals.title: Global Renewables Hit 800GW Annual Record
signals.description: 2025년 글로벌 태양광 및 풍력 설치량 800GW 돌파로 사상 최대 기록. 2021년 대비 연간 배치량 3배 증가. 청정 기술이 2026년 신규 에너지 배치 지배, 미국 신규 발전 용량의 90% 이상이 청정 에너지.

signals.title: EV Sales Reach 25% Global Market Share
signals.description: EV 판매가 글로벌 자동차 판매의 4분의 1 이상 차지. 2030년까지 40% 비중 도달 전망으로 전기차 채택 가속화.

signals.title: Climate Tech Investment Surges on Data Center Energy Demand
signals.description: 2025년 글로벌 기후 기술 투자 반등, 주로 데이터센터 에너지 수요 증가에 기인. 신생 원자력 기술과 검증된 재생에너지 솔루션 모두 투자자 관심 집중으로 2026년에도 상승세 지속 전망.

signals.title: Venture Funding 2025 Sets All-Time Records
signals.description: 2025년 글로벌 벤처 펀딩 급증, 스타트업 딜과 밸류에이션이 사상 최고 기록. 2026년 전망은 성장 라운드 재개로 벤처 캐피탈 배치 10-15% 증가 예상.

signals.title: xAI Raises Historic $20B Series E for AGI Development
signals.description: xAI가 AGI 로드맵 확장과 GPU 인프라 구축을 위해 역사적인 200억 달러 시리즈 E 투자 유치. 스타트업 역사상 최대 규모 단일 펀딩 라운드 중 하나.

signals.title: AI Attracts 65% of Startup Capital in 2026
signals.description: 인공지능이 2026년 스타트업 형성과 벤처 펀딩의 가장 큰 단일 자석으로 유지. 투자 성격은 순수 성장에서 자본 효율성과 수익성으로 결정적 전환.

signals.title: Cyera Raises $400M for Enterprise AI Security
signals.description: Cyera가 기업 AI 배포 보안을 위해 4억 달러 투자 유치. AI 보안 인프라에 대한 관심과 투자 증가 반영.

signals.title: Capital Efficiency Becomes Top VC Priority
signals.description: 자본 비용이 0이 아니며 LP들이 종이 마크업이 아닌 실제 수익을 요구. 벤처 투자자들이 자본 효율성, 수익성, 명확한 유닛 이코노믹스라는 비즈니스 기본에 우선순위 부여.

signals.title: Trump Executive Order Preempts State AI Laws
signals.description: 트럼프 대통령이 '인공지능을 위한 국가 정책 프레임워크 보장' 행정명령 서명. 불일치하는 주 AI 법률을 선점하는 연방 AI 정책 프레임워크 제안. 법무장관에게 AI 소송 태스크포스 설립 지시.

signals.title: 38 States Pass AI Legislation in 2025
signals.description: 2025년 38개 주에서 AI 관련 법률 통과. 선거에서의 AI 오용 방지 및 의료 정보 배포 기술 규제 포함. 캘리포니아 AI 투명성법, 텍사스 책임 있는 AI 거버넌스법이 2026년 1월 1일 발효.

signals.title: OMB Issues Federal AI Procurement Guidance
signals.description: 2025년 12월 발표된 관리예산처(OMB) 조달 지침에서 연방 정부가 조달하는 대형 언어 모델이 진실 추구와 이념적 중립성을 포함한 편향 없는 AI 원칙을 준수하도록 계약 요건 명시.

signals.title: 2026 AI Enforcement Year: Focus on Red Lines
signals.description: 2026년은 새로운 선언이 아닌 집행과 레드라인의 해가 될 전망. 핵심 질문: 정부가 생체 대량 감시, 자율 무기 등 특정 응용을 금지할 의지가 있는지, 자발적 행동강령에 만족할 것인지.

signals.title: Analogue January: Gen Z Ditches Screens for Tactile Experiences
signals.description: Gen Z에서 손글씨 편지, 손으로 그린 미술, 수작업 공예 등 'Proof of Human' 활동 부활. 'Human-Made'가 2000년대 초 'Organic'보다 더 강력한 레이블로 부상. 2026년을 '아날로그의 해'로 지칭.

signals.title: Gen Z Seeks Emotional Grounding Amid Ambient Chaos
signals.description: 2026년 Gen Z의 주요 테마는 지속적인 디지털 자극과 경제적 압박 속에서 의도적 삶과 정서적 안정 추구. 세 가지 문화 동인: 정서적 위안, 큐레이팅된 자기표현, 현실적 낙관주의.

signals.title: Gen Z Revives Pen Pals and Letter Writing
signals.description: Gen Z와 밀레니얼 사용자의 4분의 1 이상이 손글씨나 편지 보내기를 재발견. 싱가포르 Gen Z는 평균 Pinterest 사용자보다 펜팔 트렌드 참여 가능성 4.12배 높음. 웰빙을 트렌드가 아닌 라이프스타일로 취급.

signals.title: Gen Z Shifts to Social-First Search Over Traditional Search Engines
signals.description: Gen Z의 41%가 정보 검색 시 소셜 미디어 플랫폼을 먼저 이용, 전통적 검색 엔진(32%)을 앞지름. 구전과 지역 발견으로 회귀하며 Gen Z의 구매력이 소셜 커머스에서 이탈.

signals.title: Hyperscale AI Data Centers: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
signals.description: Hyperscale AI data centers are now consuming over 1 gigawatt of electricity each, bundling hundreds of thousands of GPUs like Nvidia's H100s. Over 50% powered by fossil fuels, raising energy costs and infrastructure concerns for communities. Major tech firms investing hundreds of billions.

signals.title: D-Wave Announces First Major Quantum Computing Breakthrough of 2026
signals.description: D-Wave claimed quantum supremacy after successfully simulating magnetic materials properties using Advantage2 annealing quantum computer. IBM predicts 2026 will mark first time quantum outperforms classical computers on practical problems.

signals.title: AI-Quantum Convergence: 2026 Inflection Point
signals.description: 2026 emerging as inflection point where AI and quantum computing function as unified force. Google DeepMind's AlphaQubit AI Decoder identifies qubit errors with 30% greater accuracy than traditional methods.

signals.title: Error-Correction Technology Brings Quantum Computing Closer to Reality
signals.description: Advances in quantum error-correction bring dream of large-scale quantum computation involving millions of qubits within reach. Marks critical milestone for practical quantum applications.

signals.title: Climate Status 2026: Record Temperatures Despite La Nina
signals.description: 2025 was second-hottest year on record. Last 12 years warmest ever measured. Oceans absorbed energy equivalent to detonating nearly 10 Hiroshima bombs per second every minute in 2025. US emissions rose 2% in 2025 reversing downward trend.

signals.title: China's Clean Energy Dominance: 300 GW Annual Installations
signals.description: China's emissions stabilized over past 18 months. EVs comprise >50% of new car sales. China installed >300 GW renewable capacity annually, exceeding entire US historical total. Exported >$200B clean technologies globally.

signals.title: AI Captures 65% of US VC Deal Value in 2026
signals.description: AI driving VC momentum, capturing 65% of US VC deal value and 37.1% of non-life-sciences first financings. AI startups commanding significantly higher valuations. US accounts for 85% of global AI funding and 53% of AI deals.

signals.title: State Interventionism and Trade Policy Acceleration in 2026
signals.description: Governments enacting new trade policies, tariffs, export controls, local content requirements to mandate or incentivize companies to modify supply chains and trade patterns. State interventionism flourishing.

signals.title: AI Regulation: EU AI Act Becomes Fully Applicable August 2, 2026
signals.description: Governments increasingly treating AI assets as national security priority and critical infrastructure. AI serving as force multiplier of cyber conflicts. EU AI Act moving from planning to real operational gravity August 2, 2026.

signals.title: New START Expires February 2026: End of Nuclear Arms Control
signals.description: New START treaty expires February 2026, leaving US and Russia without legally binding nuclear restrictions. Without verification mechanisms, deployed warheads could potentially exceed 6,000 within a decade.

signals.title: MIT: Personalized Gene Editing Reaches Clinical Reality
signals.description: Personalized gene editing technology reaching clinical maturity with MIT breakthroughs.

signals.title: DeepSeek mHC: Architecture Breakthrough for Trillion-Parameter Models
signals.description: DeepSeek released paper solving training instability at scale by constraining information mixing to doubly stochastic matrices, enabling stable training of much larger models. Could unlock trillion-parameter AI models.

signals.title: Q-CTRL Achieves First Commercial Quantum Advantage in GPS-Denied Navigation
signals.description: Q-CTRL demonstrates first commercial quantum advantage with 50-100X improvement in GPS-denied navigation.

signals.title: South Korea Enforces AI Basic Act Early 2026
signals.description: South Korea implementing AI Basic Act with liability framework.

signals.title: Vast Plans First Commercial Space Station Launch (Haven-1) in 2026
signals.description: Vast Space planning Haven-1 commercial space station launch in 2026.

signals.title: Japan's Immigration Revolution: Points-Based Work Visa System 2026
signals.description: Japan implementing points-based work visa system to address demographic crisis.

signals.title: South Africa's Rising Femicide: 34,000 Deaths in Decade
signals.description: South Africa experiencing rising femicide crisis with 34,000 deaths in past decade.

signals.title: Global Religious Polarization: Belief Systems as Tribal Identity
signals.description: Religious belief systems becoming tribal identity markers with increasing polarization.

signals.title: Indian Digital Economy Expanding: Emerging Power in AI-ML
signals.description: India rising as AI-ML power with expanding digital economy.

signals.title: Breakthrough in Universal Flu Vaccine Development
signals.description: Universal flu vaccine development reaching breakthrough stage.

signals.title: Water Scarcity Crisis: Groundwater Depletion Accelerating Globally
signals.description: Global groundwater depletion accelerating with major freshwater security implications.

signals.title: Rise of AI-Generated Deepfakes: Content Authenticity Crisis
signals.description: AI-generated deepfakes becoming indistinguishable, creating authenticity crisis.

signals.title: Misinformation and Conspiracy Theories: Echo Chambers Deepening
signals.description: Echo chambers deepening with algorithmic amplification of misinformation.

signals.title: Aging Workforce: Median Age Exceeds 40 in Developed Nations
signals.description: Demographic aging with median age exceeding 40 in developed nations.

signals.title: CRISPR-Based Treatment for Sickle Cell Disease Approved
signals.description: CRISPR-based therapy approved for sickle cell disease treatment.

signals.title: Bacterial Resistance Crisis: Untreatable Infections Rising
signals.description: Antibiotic resistance accelerating with untreatable infections increasing.

signals.title: Mental Health Crisis Among Gen Z: Depression and Anxiety Epidemic
signals.description: Gen Z experiencing mental health crisis with depression and anxiety epidemic.

signals.title: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Market Volatility: Regulatory Uncertainty
signals.description: Cryptocurrency market facing regulatory uncertainty and volatility.

signals.title: OPEC+ Production Cuts: Oil Markets Face Instability
signals.description: OPEC+ production cuts creating oil market instability.

signals.title: European Energy Independence: LNG Diversification Succeeds
signals.description: Europe achieving energy independence through LNG diversification.

signals.title: Technology Skills Gap: STEM Education Falling Short
signals.description: STEM education gaps creating technology skills shortage.

signals.title: Sustainable Fashion Movement: Circular Economy Adoption Growing
signals.description: Sustainable fashion movement growing with circular economy adoption.

signals.title: Urban Agriculture Revolution: Vertical Farms Going Mainstream
signals.description: Vertical farming technology becoming mainstream.

signals.title: Methane Emissions: Arctic Permafrost Thaw Accelerating
signals.description: Arctic permafrost thaw accelerating with methane emissions increasing.

signals.title: Ocean Acidification: Marine Ecosystem Collapse Accelerating
signals.description: Ocean acidification accelerating with marine ecosystem collapse risk.

signals.title: Renewable Energy Capacity Exceeds Fossil Fuels Globally
signals.description: Renewable energy capacity surpassing fossil fuels globally.

signals.title: Insect Populations Declining: Ecological Collapse Early Indicator
signals.description: Insect population decline indicating ecological collapse risk.

signals.title: Rare Earth Element Supply Chains: China Dominance Tightens
signals.description: China tightening control over rare earth element supply chains.

signals.title: 5G and 6G Infrastructure Race: Global Standards Competition
signals.description: 5G-6G infrastructure race with competing global standards.

signals.title: Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Advancement: Neuralink Progress
signals.description: Brain-computer interface technology advancing with Neuralink progress.

signals.title: Gene Therapy Expands: Multiple Genetic Disorders Becoming Treatable
signals.description: Gene therapy expanding to treat multiple genetic disorders.

signals.title: Autonomous Vehicles: Limited Deployment in Specific Conditions
signals.description: Autonomous vehicles deploying in limited, controlled conditions.

signals.title: Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) Projections: Timelines Compressing
signals.description: AGI timeline projections compressing with accelerating capability advances.

signals.title: Synthetic Biology: Biomanufacturing Revolutionary Potential
signals.description: Synthetic biology reaching manufacturing scale with revolutionary potential.

signals.title: Carbon Capture Technology: Scaling and Economic Viability Questions
signals.description: Carbon capture technology scaling with economic viability questions.

signals.title: Renewable Energy Storage: Battery Technology Advances
signals.description: Battery technology advancing for renewable energy storage.

signals.title: Pandemic Preparedness: mRNA Vaccine Technology Advances
signals.description: mRNA vaccine technology advancing for pandemic preparedness.

signals.title: Digital Identity Systems: Global Standards Development Ongoing
signals.description: Digital identity systems and standards development in progress.

signals.title: Space Exploration: Commercial Moon Base Development Underway
signals.description: Commercial moon base development progressing.

signals.title: Coral Reef Restoration: Intervention Success Stories Emerging
signals.description: Coral reef restoration success stories emerging.

signals.title: Biodiversity Loss Acceleration: Sixth Mass Extinction Underway
signals.description: Sixth mass extinction accelerating with biodiversity loss.

signals.title: Cryptocurrency Regulation: Frameworks Emerging Globally
signals.description: Global cryptocurrency regulation frameworks emerging.

signals.title: Gender Equality Progress: UN SDG 5 Implementation Tracking
signals.description: UN SDG 5 gender equality implementation progress tracking.

signals.title: Education Technology: AI Tutoring Systems Reaching Scale
signals.description: AI tutoring systems reaching operational scale.

signals.title: Economic Inequality: Wealth Gap Widening Globally
signals.description: Global wealth gap continuing to widen.

signals.title: Supply Chain Resilience: Post-Pandemic Lessons Being Applied
signals.description: Supply chain resilience improvements from pandemic lessons.

signals.title: Urban Development: Smart Cities Initiative Progress
signals.description: Smart cities initiative making progress.

signals.title: Manufacturing Automation: Robotics Industry Expansion Accelerating
signals.description: Manufacturing robotics and automation expansion accelerating.

signals.title: Transportation Electrification: EV Market Reaching Critical Mass
signals.description: EV market reaching critical mass.

signals.title: Healthcare Access: Telemedicine Expansion in Developing Nations
signals.description: Telemedicine expanding to developing nations.

signals.title: Agricultural Technology: Precision Farming Adoption Increasing
signals.description: Precision farming adoption increasing.

signals.title: Democracy Under Pressure: Authoritarian Expansion and Backsliding
signals.description: Democratic backsliding and authoritarian expansion.

signals.title: Migration and Displacement: Climate Refugee Crisis Looming
signals.description: Climate refugee crisis emerging.

signals.title: AI Safety and Alignment: Research Community Growing but Lagging
signals.description: AI safety and alignment research lagging behind capability development.

signals.title: Conflict Prevention: Geopolitical Tensions Escalating Globally
signals.description: Geopolitical tensions escalating globally.

signals.title: Cybersecurity Threats: Nation-State Attacks Becoming Normalized
signals.description: Nation-state cyber attacks becoming normalized.

signals.title: Labor Market Disruption: AI Job Displacement Predictions Intensifying
signals.description: AI-driven job displacement predictions intensifying.

signals.title: Food Insecurity: Global Hunger Rising Despite Productivity Gains
signals.description: Global food insecurity rising despite productivity gains.
